subgenie.summary: Recent activities include server updates, a sample video addition, and requirements.txt changes, along with a backend-subtitle connection to frontend. Dummy subtitles with editing capabilities and timestamp adjustments have also been implemented.

yt-vidmate.summary: The repository has seen recent improvements, including major bug fixes related to temp files and downloads, README file creation, and project name adjustments. These updates significantly enhance the repository's overall functionality and user experience.

vidmate-web.summary: Recent updates include the addition of new URLs to the project, expanding its scope and capabilities. These additions indicate ongoing development and enhancement of the repository.

profile_summary:
Jishnu M M is a highly skilled software developer, possessing a versatile expertise in programming languages such as Python, TypeScript, and JavaScript. As an accomplished MERN Stack developer and Python enthusiast, Jishnu consistently demonstrates a passion for designing and delivering high-quality software solutions. With an impressive repertoire of 79 public repositories, it is evident that Jishnu actively engages in coding activities and continuously refines his skills, fostering growth in his professional network.

Jishnu's professional achievements have earned him recognition as a trusted and innovative developer, as seen in his considerable following of 31 fellow professionals. As a focused and dedicated BTech student at Cochin University of Science and Technology (CUSAT), Jishnu combines theoretical foundations with practical experience to produce cutting-edge software that exceeds expectations. With a well-rounded skill set and dedication to delivering exceptional results, Jishnu is poised to drive significant value in the tech industry and inspire others through his expertise.
